石棉暴露和致癌性：全面审查石棉是一组天然存在的纤维矿物，历史上因其耐用性和耐热性而被使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Asbestos-exposure-and-carcinogenicity-A-compressive-review.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Asbestos-exposure-and-carcinogenicity-A-compressive-review.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca58a97a-ddba-4a6a-9a38-633781f4324f Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:19:00 -0400 Asbestos exposure and carcinogenicity: A comprehensive review
仅靠日常体力活动不足以预防中风哥德堡大学进行的研究表明，我们在生活中、工作中或家里进行的体育活动不足以保护我们免于中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Everyday-physical-activity-alone-not-enough-to-prevent-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Everyday-physical-activity-alone-not-enough-to-prevent-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9a173a-b10b-4e5b-9c21-9d364d3b7fca Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:01:32 -0400 Everyday physical activity alone not enough to prevent stroke
早期课堂健康教育预防儿童腹部脂肪堆积由国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 和 Fundación SHE 领导并得到“la Caixa”基金会支持的一项研究表明，通过课堂活动教授健康习惯有助于防止学年第一年腹部脂肪的堆积。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Early-classroom-based-health-education-prevents-abdominal-fat-accumulation-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Early-classroom-based-health-education-prevents-abdominal-fat-accumulation-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f05aaf6e-c78a-49ed-b0e8-a2e19d81fb78 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 13:56:36 -0400 Early classroom-based health education prevents abdominal fat accumulation in children
了解 β 地中海贫血的铁超负荷：机制、诊断和治疗β-地中海贫血是一种遗传性疾病，其特征是血红蛋白β链合成减少或缺失，导致红细胞生成无效和严重贫血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Understanding-iron-overload-in-ceb2-thalassemia-Mechanisms-diagnosis-and-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Understanding-iron-overload-in-ceb2-thalassemia-Mechanisms-diagnosis-and-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b4b65d9-e283-47e9-a336-ed48551ed722 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 13:15:01 -0400 Understanding iron overload in β-thalassemia: Mechanisms, diagnosis, and treatments

脐带血中的 PUFA 代谢物可能预测自闭症谱系障碍自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）是一种神经发育障碍，影响人们的学习能力和社会行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/PUFA-metabolites-in-umbilical-cord-blood-may-predict-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/PUFA-metabolites-in-umbilical-cord-blood-may-predict-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff8de88e-2a09-4b3c-9a52-d3fd3c553cd2 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 13:03:08 -0400 PUFA metabolites in umbilical cord blood may predict autism spectrum disorder
研究揭示TNF-α受体在组织再生和细胞死亡中的双重作用发表在《EMBO 杂志》上的一项研究为更好地理解再生医学中涉及的分子机制如何发挥作用开辟了新的视角。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Study-unveils-dual-roles-of-TNF-ceb1-receptors-in-tissue-regenesis-and-cell-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Study-unveils-dual-roles-of-TNF-ceb1-receptors-in-tissue-regenesis-and-cell-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cfad1b4-2c1b-4842-9b7d-25058775cab6 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 12:40:00 -0400 Study unveils dual roles of TNF-α receptors in tissue regeneration and cell death
在常见野生动物物种中检测到 SARS-CoV-2根据弗吉尼亚理工大学周一（2024 年 7 月 29 日）在《自然通讯》上发表的研究，导致 COVID-19 的病毒 SARS-CoV-2 在野生动物物种中广泛传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/SARS-CoV-2-Detected-in-common-wildlife-species.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/SARS-CoV-2-Detected-in-common-wildlife-species.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53e8e98b-058e-4a11-afa0-6ada3c891b23 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 11:11:03 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 detected in common wildlife species
可穿戴式非侵入性设备可以在临床环境中测量人类颈神经的活动由加州大学圣地亚哥分校领导的研究小组首次证明，可穿戴式非侵入性设备可以在临床环境中测量人类颈神经的活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Wearable-non-induced-device-can-measure-activity-in- human-cervical-nerves-in-clinical-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Wearable-non-induced-device-can-measure-activity-in- human-cervical-nerves-in-clinical-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c969771-bbd8-4674-9c7f-0d527a133301 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 10:30:10 -0400 Wearable, non-invasive device can measure activity in human cervical nerves in clinical settings
